attributes.action: Seriously consider the introduction of a British constitution, That gives every British subject equal rights ,responsibilities and opourtinities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As Britain is currently being seen as the most supervised country in the world, we feel it is about time the Prime Minister stood up for the people who elected the Labour Party in and give them back a range of basic British Rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
